MooEditable.desc: Class for creating a WYSIWYG editor, for contentEditable-capable browsers.

MooEditable.UI.MenuItem.desc: UI Class to create a menu list (select) element.

MooEditable.Extras.desc: Extends MooEditable to include more (simple) toolbar buttons.

MooEditable.Group.desc: A MooEditable extension for having multiple MooEditable instances on a page controlled by one toolbar.
